hero.title: Weekly Car Drops with Real Fleet Pricing
hero.subtitle: Get access to exclusive deals on new cars with transparent fleet pricing. No hidden fees, no dealer markup.
hero.benefit2_title: We don't share your data with dealers for cold calls.
hero.benefit2_description: Contact only with one dealer after 100% deal confirmation.
hero.important_notice: Important: Approval subject to credit qualification.

offers.title: Current Fleet Offers
offers.subtitle: Exclusive deals on premium vehicles
offers.subscribe_subtitle: Get notified about new fleet offers first
offers.privacy_notice: We don't share your data with dealers. Unsubscribe anytime.
offers.disclaimer: Important note: All payments are approximate and depend on credit history, down payment, loan term and other factors. Final terms are determined by the dealer after credit approval. Offers valid until specified date or while supplies last.

drop.title: Weekly Drop
drop.subtitle: Every Monday at midnight Los Angeles time we publish new exclusive offers
drop.next_drop_time: Next drop: Monday, 00:00 Los Angeles time
drop.what_to_expect: What to expect in the next drop:
drop.savings_up_to: Savings up to $8,000 on popular models
drop.subscribe_early: Subscribe and find out about new drops 15 minutes before publication
drop.will_notify: We'll notify you about the next drop
drop.no_spam: We only send important notifications about new offers. No spam. You can unsubscribe at any time.

coverage.title: Service Areas
coverage.subtitle: We work with verified dealers throughout Los Angeles and surrounding areas
coverage.contact_us: If your area isn't listed, contact us — we may be able to arrange special delivery.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Simple 3-step process — from selection to getting your car
how_it_works.step1_description: Access to closed fleet prices with VIN and exact offer expiration date
how_it_works.step2_description: No add-ons — we show average amounts by models and remove them
how_it_works.step3_description: After 100% agreement on terms, come to dealer for fully prepared car
how_it_works.credit_notice: Car financing is subject to suitable credit history. We do a preliminary soft check that doesn't affect your credit score.

trust.title: Our Commitments to You
trust.subtitle: We built our business on trust and transparency. Every promise is our reputation.
trust.point1_description: VIN numbers confirmed by dealers. No bait-and-switch or fake prices.
trust.point2_description: What you see is what you pay. No surprises at the last moment.
trust.point3_description: Don't waste time negotiating. The price is already the best possible.
trust.point4_description: We don't share your contacts with dealers for cold calls. Only agreed contact.
trust.point5_description: Deposit returned in full if you decline before signing documents.
trust.point6_description: We answer questions within 15 minutes any time of day or night.
trust.privacy_description: We never share your contact information with dealers for cold calls. Contact with dealer happens only after you 100% agree on all deal terms. This means one call, one meeting, one dealer — and your new car is ready for delivery.

car_detail.offer_unavailable: Offer may no longer be available

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about fleet offers and our service
faq.no_data_sharing: We never share your data with dealers for cold calls.
faq.privacy_explanation: Unlike other sites where your number immediately goes to dozens of dealers, we contact only one dealer and only after you 100% agree on all deal terms.
faq.one_contact_process: one call, one meeting, one dealer — and your new car is ready for delivery.
faq.support_response: Our team answers questions 24/7. Average response — less than 15 minutes.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Real stories from people who avoided haggling and saved thousands of dollars

credit_check.title: Learn Your Financing Terms
credit_check.subtitle: Preliminary Credit Check
credit_check.description: Get personalized offers without affecting your credit rating
credit_check.consent_text: I agree to a soft credit check and receiving personalized offers. I understand my data will not be shared with dealers for cold calls.
credit_check.term1: Soft check doesn't affect your credit score
credit_check.term2: Final terms depend on full credit history check
credit_check.term3: We don't share your contacts with dealers for cold calls
credit_check.term4: Results will arrive via email within 15 minutes
credit_check.check_results_message: We received your information and are conducting a soft credit check. Results and personalized offers will be sent to your email within 15 minutes.
credit_check.soft_check_info: Soft check doesn't affect your credit rating and is not visible to other lenders.
